experiment_info.name: kriging_local_infill
experiment_info.description: Use local Kriging around CMA-ES mean for candidate pre-screening
experiment_info.hypothesis: Local Kriging may predict candidate quality for pre-screening

reason_aborted: SURROGATE FAMILY EXHAUSTED. Multiple experiments prove: (1) cmaes_rbf_surrogate: 'CMA-ES covariance adaptation is already implicit surrogate modeling. ~10% rejection rate, ~6% sim reduction. Not worth complexity.' (2) bayesian_optimization_gp: GP poorly models RMSE landscape, 91% worse accuracy. (3) lq_cma_es: With only 10-18 fevals, not enough data for surrogate. (4) gappy_cpod: 'surrogate_v2 family EXHAUSTED'.

cmaes_rbf_surrogate.finding: CMA-ES covariance adaptation is already implicit surrogate modeling

bayesian_optimization_gp.finding: GP surrogate poorly models RMSE landscape

lq_cma_es_builtin.finding: With only 10-18 fevals, not enough data for surrogate

key_insight: Kriging is a GP surrogate - same as the failed Bayesian Optimization. CMA-ES's covariance adaptation already provides implicit surrogate modeling. Adding explicit Kriging on top provides ~6% potential benefit for significant implementation complexity.
